### Item
Next, we want to know what kinds of messages you would like to receive from our <!--recovery support app--> if you were using it.  We can write these message to be more **formal** (for example, professional or polite -- like how your doctor might speak to you) or **informal** (for example, casual or conversational -- like how your friend might message you).  We want to know *your* specific preferences about how formal vs. informal these messages should be.
